name: sawlog and veneer log, meranti, debarked, measured as solid wood, import from MY | sawlog and veneer log, meranti, debarked, measured as solid wood | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3063/documentation

This dataset represents the import of debarked meranti logs to European port. The imported wood is produced by (close to) sustainable forest management in Malasya. A transport distance of 200 km by a lorry (32 t) is assumed for the transportation of the logs to a main naval port in Malaysia. A transport distance of 15,000 km by a maritime freight ship is assumed for the overseas transportation of the log to a main naval port in Europe, e.g. Rotterdam, Antwerpen, Bremerhafen or Hamburg.

The activity starts with the product delivered at the forest road.

This activity ends with imported meranti roundwood at European harbour.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/02:Forestry and logging/022:Logging/0220:Logging

exchanges.description: Reference product. The reference product being imported is meranti legs that are harvested from (close to) sustainable forest management in Malaysia. Data based on given reference.

exchanges.description: Reference product. Meranti logs at a large maritime harbour in Europe. The meranti wood is produced by (close to) sustainable forest management. It is shipped to Europe to be used in wooden products.
